testcase.system-out: When kullanici "editorUrl" anasayfaya gider.................................passed Then new butonuna basar.....................................................passed And First name kutusuna "Ilker" yazar.......................................passed And Last name kutusuna "Bulut" yazar........................................passed And position kutusuna "QA" yazar............................................passed And Office kutusuna "Istanbul" yazar........................................passed And Extension kutusuna "levent" yazar.......................................passed And Start date kutusuna "2021-01-01" yazar..................................passed And Salary kutusuna "20000" yazar...........................................passed And Create tusuna basar.....................................................passed When kullanici "Ilker" ile arama yapar......................................passed Then isim bolumunde "Ilker" oldugunu dogrular...............................passed And 3 saniye bekler.........................................................passed
